entry.title: RIP Hal Finney
entry.summary: On August 28, 2014, Matt Corallo announced the death of Hal Finney in a message. The writer did not personally know Hal Finney; however, he still felt saddened by the news. Hal Finney wrote a thought-provoking post about his battle with ALS on Bitcoin Talk in 2013, which was shared as an inspiration for all. Oliver acknowledged Hal Finney as an inspiring character due to his work and contributions.
